meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7372.

div.div:
Seth Wilson game 12.
WE ASKED: Matthew Weiner.

td.p: Ben Wynns, a nonprofit coordinator from New York City, New York
Joe Schneider, a senior index editor from Old Bridge, New Jersey
Seth Wilson, a Ph.D. candidate from Chicago, Illinois (whose 11-day cash winnings total $245,002)

tr.td: SALUTE THE RED, WHITE & BLUE
THEATER TALK
HAVE AN "EF"ECT
KEEP IT 100
WHAT A TV CHARACTER!
IT'S THE CATALINA WINE MIXER

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This state\'s flag is easily flown upside down by mistake; it\'s even happened over the Capitol in Nashville')

tr.td: This state's flag is easily flown upside down by mistake; it's even happened over the Capitol in Nashville
